meanings.definition: A drink made from lemon juice, sugar, and water.
meanings.sent1: I love to drink lemonade on hot days.
meanings.sent2: At the picnic, everyone enjoyed a glass of refreshing lemonade.
meanings.sent3: The lemonade decided to take a swim in the glass of water.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was as bright and bubbly as a glass of lemonade.
meanings.sent5: The lemonade sparkled like sunshine in a cup.

meanings.definition: A sweetened beverage made from lemon juice and water.
meanings.sent1: Mom bought a jug of lemonade for the family barbecue.
meanings.sent2: The kids set up a lemonade stand to raise money for charity.
meanings.sent3: The lemonade giggled as it danced in the pitcher.
meanings.sent4: His smile was as sweet and tangy as a sip of lemonade.
meanings.sent5: The lemonade tasted like a burst of summer in my mouth.
